frame.name: Deserving
frame.definition:
<def-root>The existence of a <fen>State_of_affairs</fen> is sufficient reason for taking an <fen>Action</fen> . The agent who is justified in taking the suggested <fen>Action</fen> is not part of the immediate scene, however.
<ex><fex name="State_of_affairs">The underwater sequences</fex> <t>warrant</t> <fex name="Action">the price of the admission alone</fex>.</ex>
<ex> '<fex name="State_of_affairs">Desperate situations</fex> <t>call</t> <fex name="Action">for desperate measures</fex> ," said Mr Eames grandly.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: State_of_affairs
FE.definition:
<def-root>An Eventuality or an Entity that is taken to constitute sufficient reason for taking another <fen>Action</fen>.
<ex> <fex name="State_of_affairs">A heavy contact to the opponent 's face</fex> may not <t>merit</t> just a verbal warning </ex></def-root>

FE.name: Action
FE.definition:
<def-root>An <fen>Action</fen> that is taken to be justifiable given the <fen>State_of_Affairs</fen>.
<ex> The end <t>justifies</t> <fex name="Action">the means</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Degree
FE.definition:
<def-root>How sufficiently <fen>State_of_affairs</fen> can be considered a reason for the <fen>Action</fen>.
<ex>Your son's behavior <fex name="Degree">completely</fex> <t>justifies</t> the punishment he received.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Domain
FE.definition:
<def-root>The general spectrum of reasoning along which the <fen>State_of_affairs</fen> is a justification.
<ex>Not all bad behavior <fex name="Domain">legally</fex> <t>justifies</t> eviction.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Circumstances
FE.definition: <def-root><fen>Circumstances</fen> describe the state of the world (at a particular time and place) which is specifically independent of the Deserving event and any of its participants.</def-root>
